title: Can a leaverbuster be lifted because of lag?
body: I was in game and when I switch my music I lag, then it tends to freeze. So I have to shut my computer down (leaving game also) and coming back.  I always come back and I find it unfair that I get a leaverbuster just because of a lag spike every so often, I would love some feedback to fix this issue, thanks! - ThisEzrealLife{{champion:157}}

replies.body: yup, for sure. When I log in for the first time to the game it's 50/50 chance to log in succesfully. After a message to reconnect it's going fast. Connection problem, but leaverbuster is judge...{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Hi there Ezreallife! Love the name! Anyway unfortunately with leave buster it cannot tell whether you left on purpose or accidental. I only sees that you left the game. I hope you are able to fix your issue!

~KittySuppSquad {{sticker:sona-playing}} {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

It is completely fair.

The lag is not riot's fault, it is yours due to you intentionally doing something that you know causes a glitch due to your damaged/misconfigured computer.

Consider fixing the issue. Then you get the benefit of not lagging, and not getting banned.
